full_summary:
### 5P423-220167(B) - Aluminum Solid Waste Transfer Trailer
### Remorque en aluminium pour le transfert de déchets solides
#### Announcement # Title
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites suppliers to submit their proposals for the supply and delivery of an Aluminum Solid Waste Transfer Trailer for the Parks Canada Agency (PC) located at Jasper National Park, Alberta.

#### Project Background
The Parks Canada Agency is seeking the supply and delivery of an Aluminum Solid Waste Transfer Trailer for its maintenance facility at Jasper National Park. The trailer is required for the efficient collection and transportation of solid waste within the park. The Agency requires that the trailer is delivered by March 31, 2023.

#### Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: # 5P423-220167(B)
* Publication Date: January 6, 2023
* Closing Date: February 6, 2023 at 14:00 HNE
* Amendment Date: January 27, 2023
* Contract Start Date: February 10, 2023
* Contract End Date: July 31, 2023

#### Instructions to Suppliers
This solicitation cancels and supersedes the previous solicitation number Doc 3742074050 dated November 18, 2022. Suppliers who submitted bids on the previous solicitation may request a debriefing session. However, any supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received before 14:00 HNE on February 6, 2023. Failure to meet this deadline will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

#### Procurement Method and Evaluation Criteria
The procurement method is competitive and open to applicants. The evaluation criteria will be based on the lowest price.

#### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Ariane Vanvi, PSPC
Tel: [Not Provided]
Email: [ariane.vanvi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ariane.vanvi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL
To access the solicitation and additional information, please
